data.text: I think there's a broad, though not complete, consensus that the best sub-$1,000 adventure bikes (assuming your preference is drop bars?) are the Poseidon Redwood and the State All-Road 4130. If you can go a bit higher in the budget (but not too much), A Salsa Journeyer would be high on my list at the $1-1.5k range. I'd also look hard at the Jamis Renegade series, a wide budget range and good value from a great brand.
